table.name: ob_line_status
table.description: The status of the line item within a base order. This table links to the defined status(es) in the Status_Type and Status_Value table.

columns.name: OB_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base line.

columns.name: STATUS_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The status type GID for the status value on the order base line.

columns.name: STATUS_VALUE_GID
columns.description: The status value for the order base line status.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
